title: Real-Time Insights
content: KO offers real-time visibility into your child's digital activities, giving you a clear understanding of how they engage with devices

title: Smart Rules
content: Receive personalised suggestions and set custom screen time rules and online behavior guidelines based on your child's age and preferences

title: Content Curator
content: Discover curated age-appropriate apps while letting your child explore digital world safely by keeping inappropriate content at bay with our advanced filtering

title: Guided Playtim
content: Encourage healthy habits by setting educational and creative playtime routines, nurturing your child's cognitive growth.

title: Open Dialogue
content: Encourage healthy habits by setting educational and creative playtime routines, nurturing your child's cognitive growth.

title: Location Tracking
content: Gain peace of mind with optional location tracking, allowing you to know your child's whereabouts when needed.

title: Psychographic Analysis
content: Access insights into your child's digital behavior and preferences through psychographic analysis, aiding in tailored guidance
